page.title: 09WORK IN THE OUNDLE BLOCK
page.content:
From looking at the land-cover data one would expect to find that most of the local residents are employed in agriculture and forestry. This is not true, because these are no longer labour-intensive industries. The area offers a variety of work.
{PRIMARY SECONDARY TERTIARY} {SECTOR SECTOR SECTOR <Farming> <Manufacturing> <Services>
Management Drainage pipes Shops Office Printing Banks Farm-work Light Catering Suppliers Engineering Post Office Solicitors Estate Agents {Many locals also commute }Domestic {to nearby towns to work.} work Garage
